title: Leaver (remake) question
body:
So today my computer explode while loading up a game for who knows why reason, naturally my team did a remake and I received a loss with the appropriate warning (even though I didn't leave intentionally, mind you) my question is how does this affects my MMR?

I'm on a very dangerous slope MMR wise where every loose can make me go from 18 LP per game to 15 hence why I'm very weary about this whole issue, I'm barely at fault that my pc froze and I had to do a hard restart :S

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean by computer exploding, but I hope you're okay!  If you want to provide some more information on the issue that is causing you to leave, I'd be happy to help!  Leaving a game will not provide you with a win, LP, or IP.  It would count as a loss as well as get you marked by the [leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)system.  We also have a great guide on [/remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) that provides more information.  It's important to resolve whatever is causing this to prevent further issues.  Let me know!

oh don't worry about that, Windows 10 apparently has these bunch of background programs going that saturate the rate at which my disk was able to write so it ended up being completely hanged, it happened to me yesterday while drawing in photoshop but since it wasn't really urgent I just let it chill for a while and eventually she came back to normal.

As you may understand being 70% loaded up on a game makes things a bit more in need of rushing so I opted for resetting it by pressing the button, but I wasn't able to come back on in time, sadly. I did some research and disabled a few features and now my disk is back at 1% - 2% from 100%, so I hope it's fixed.

I don't appreciate being tagged by the leaver buster though, this is the first time I leave a game in years, last time was because of my GPU dying so not my fault either and I just got a warning at the time.  I don't leave games intentionally since I understand how jarring the whole thing is.
